message_1:
A salesman wants to visit 5 cities in the least amount of distance possible. He knows the distance between each city, as shown below:

|City|A|B|C|D|E|
|-|-|-|-|-|-|
|A|0|2|3|7|6|
|B|2|0|4|8|5|
|C|3|4|0|6|8|
|D|7|8|6|0|4|
|E|6|5|8|4|0|

What is the shortest possible distance the salesman can travel to visit all 5 cities, starting and ending at city A?
message_2:
